price: Kjo, sepse ata fillimisht besuan, pastaj mohuan, kështu që zemrat e tyre u vulosën dhe si pasojë ata nuk kuptojnë më.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ ءَامَنُواْ ثُمَّ كَفَرُواْ فَطُبِعَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يَفۡقَهُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahum āmanū thumma kafarū faṭubiʿa ʿalā qulūbihim fahum lā yafqahūna
